title: I Am Somebody
lyrics: When I was younger, mama had said one day I'll be a star
Handful of singers, one of these dollars gon' add up tomorrow
Cadillac Brougham, pull up slowly, whistlin' El DeBarge
Tap on my shoulder, he said whatever I do, better do it with heart
I am somebody, I am

(I am, I am, I am)
I'm in the water, so I feel like salt

I mean

But I still call your name in light of the fight
